fields.name: account_type
fields.description: Type of account (e.g., checking, savings)

fields.name: logo_path
fields.description: Path to the bank's logo on the statement

fields.name: statement_period
fields.description: Period covered by the bank statement (e.g., Month YYYY)

fields.name: account_number
fields.description: Unique identifier for the account at Chase Bank

fields.name: account_holder
fields.description: Name of the account holder on this Chase account

fields.name: account_holder_address
fields.description: Address of the account holder as it appears in the Chase Bank records

fields.name: summary.beginning_balance
fields.description: The starting balance of the account for this statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_count
fields.description: Number of deposits made to this account during the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total amount of all deposits made to this account during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_count
fields.description: Number of withdrawals made from this account during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total amount of all withdrawals made from this account during the statement period

fields.name: summary.transactions_count
fields.description: Number of transactions (both deposits and withdrawals) made on this account during the statement period

fields.name: summary.ending_balance
fields.description: The final balance of the account at the end of the statement period

fields.name: deposit.date
fields.description: Date when a deposit was made to this Chase account

fields.name: deposit.description
fields.description: Description or purpose of the deposit made to this Chase account

fields.name: deposit.amount
fields.description: Amount of money deposited into this Chase account

fields.name: withdrawal.date
fields.description: Date when a withdrawal was made from this Chase account

fields.name: withdrawal.description
fields.description: Description or purpose of the withdrawal made from this Chase account

fields.name: withdrawal.amount
fields.description: Amount of money withdrawn from this Chase account

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total amount of all deposits made to this account during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total amount of all withdrawals made from this account during the statement period

fields.name: this_day
fields.description: The current day in the bank statement (e.g., Today: Monday, January 17th)

fields.name: bal
fields.description: Abbreviation for balance, as it appears on the Chase Bank statement
